name: Botcalypse
description:
Botcalypse - An action 2D shooter game where you will fight robots who are taking over the world. Hunt all robots and finish them. Save yourself from fierce missiles. Regain health with potion. Refill ammo when available.  Easy controls, dynamic sounds and much more.

Features:

  • Offline mode.
  • Tutorial to learn
  • Aggressive missiles
  • Potion and Ammo to collect
  • Health bar
